attributes.action: Ban single use plastic in school canteens
attributes.additional_details: Plastic is an ever growing problem one of the ways we can stop more and more plastic entering our oceans daily is by cutting down on our single use plastic,using alternatives we can slow down the speed of plastic entering our oceans.
attributes.background: I would like to ban single use plastic in schools canteens and change to reusable items such as paper straws cups bowls and wooden cutlery.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562920
